mapper.update:
update pcm_change_price_record
store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
matnr = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_prod_code = #{supplierProdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zsprice = #{zsprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waers = #{waers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bdate = #{bdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edate = #{edate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_code = #{changeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channelSid = #{channelsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_code = #{actionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_date = #{actionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_persion = #{actionPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pcm_change_price_record set store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, matnr = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_prod_code = #{supplierProdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zsprice = #{zsprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, waers = #{waers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bdate = #{bdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edate = #{edate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_code = #{changeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channelSid = #{channelsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_code = #{actionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_date = #{actionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_persion = #{actionPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from pcm_change_price_record pcpr INNER JOIN( SELECT store_code,matnr,bdate,MAX(change_code) as change_code FROM pcm_change_price_record WHERE attribute5 = '1' and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(bdate,'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY store_code,matnr,bdate ) pcpr2 on pcpr.store_code=pcpr2.store_code and pcpr.matnr=pcpr2.matnr AND pcpr.bdate=pcpr2.bdate AND pcpr.change_code=pcpr2.change_code
